A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: the resurrection of Star Wars comes to a screeching halt. It resembled Space Balls more than anything else.  The dated humor and lack of any depth left me with a strong sense of disgust. The addition on Rose dilutes the film even more. Her stale sarcasm screams of utter childish indulgence.  Moreover\, it begs the question..... why did they need to introduce a new character? Actually why even ask questions. This movie should have just never happened.
